entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
